jd: Hello Dear,Hope You’re Doing Well!!My name is Danish Iqbal and I am a Staffing Specialist at SIRI INFO. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients.Job Title: Business Analyst (Middle Office) Public Job Location: Quincy, MA (Hybrid)Job Duration: Contract Visa:- H1B Job Description:-Middle Office/Investment Operations domain knowledge - with financial data (knowledge of a trade lifecycle, exposure to different types of data such as positions, transactions, and income across asset classes including.7-10 years of Experience with indepth data analysis and the ability to review different data sets to determine common data components and define normalization strategy.Apply functional business knowledge when building platform requirements.Ability to gain understanding of data and transform into data marts that are useful to the client/consumer.Ability to perform gap analysis between source of data and existing data model to determine model additions.Previous experience implementing software or data services.Effective communicator – can summarize succinctly and can provide details when needed.Team oriented – capable of working in a global setting.Detail oriented and strong sense of responsibility.Flexible and can adapt easily to changing/evolving role requirements.Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.Previous State Street Middle Office experience is an advantage.Strong experience with SQL
